title: Close a notification session
description: This example demonstrates closing an active notification session to stop receiving notifications.

body.message: Notification session 'abc123def456ghi789' has been successfully closed. No further notifications will be sent to this session.

error.message: The notification session ID 'abc123def456ghi789' is invalid. Session IDs must be valid alphanumeric identifiers.
The request is not authorized. Please ensure you have valid authentication credentials and proper permissions to close notification sessions.
An internal server error occurred while closing the notification session. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact support.
